page.title: 15FARMS
page.content: Mr.M.Jackson is the farmer.The farm is 800 acres.There are 200 acres of wheat,300 acres of barley,150 acres of sugar beet,70 acres of potatoes,80 acres of beans,and also the farmer has beef cattle.6 simmental and 18 fresian cross hereford.They used to grow a lot more vegetables than they do now.They employ 3 men and have 20 extra people for potatoe picking.The farmer owns all the machinery the uses. KEEPERS COTTAGE Mrs Lamb is the owner of Keepers cottage. She has 21 goats mainly nanny goats.At one time she had 180 goats for milking,but sold them as she wanted more time to go to shows.She milks the goats twice a day,Each goat gives 6-8 pints of milk a day.Milk is sold and some is made into cheese and yogurt. Kids are taken from their mother at 4 days old.
